scripts.start: npm start --prefix server & npm start --prefix ui
scripts.test: npm test --prefix server && npm run test-coverage --prefix ui
scripts.test-e2e: npm start --prefix server & npm run start-test --prefix ui
scripts.deploy: npm run build && firebase deploy && npm run deploy --prefix server
scripts.outdated: (npm outdated || echo cli) && (npm outdated --prefix ui || echo ui) && (npm outdated --prefix server || echo server)
scripts.delete-all: rm -fr node_modules/ package-lock.json && (cd ui; rm -fr node_modules/ package-lock.json) && (cd server; rm -fr node_modules/ package-lock.json)
scripts.install-all: npm install && npm install --prefix ui && npm install --prefix server
scripts.reinstall-all: npm run delete-all && npm run install-all
